title: Client appears than disappears and won't open to the press play screen any fixes kinda annoying.
body: Same as the title, I open the executable and League of Legends pops up and then instantly disappears and within the task manager it literally ends the task and doesn't reappear.  So if anyone knows of a fix, comment down below thanks in advance.  {{item:3070}}     {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [reinstalling league of legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) completely.
Update: I uninstalled and it still doesn't open? This issue is still persisting haha so fun please help
